name: Shan Fu
personality: Quiet and reserved, but highly focused on his job. Can be a bit stern with his subordinates.
story: Xing Chou grew up in a small village in rural China. He was the youngest of three children and often felt overlooked by his parents. He grew interested in military tactics and strategy at a young age, and joined the Chinese military as soon as he was able. He quickly rose through the ranks due to his talent with missile systems. Despite his success, he still feels like an outsider in the military due to his quiet personality and rural background.
